title: Remove photo rendering and background music from the Valentine experience

requirements.summary: Remove all background music loading/playback logic and hide any music control UI.
acceptanceCriteria: No audio element is created and no call to play background music occurs on app load.
The music control UI is not rendered anywhere in the app (including any 'Play Music' prompt).
The app has no runtime console errors related to missing audio assets.

file_operations.description: Remove the MusicControls import and stop rendering the MusicControls UI so the app no longer shows any music-related controls.
Delete the MusicControls component to ensure no music UI (including autoplay-blocked prompts) can be rendered.
Delete the background-music hook so no audio file is instantiated, loaded, or played from anywhere in the codebase.

requirements.summary: Remove all photo/image rendering and eliminate references to the existing Valentine photo assets across Pages 2–5.
acceptanceCriteria: Pages 2–5 do not render any photo/image components and do not reference /assets/images/photo1.jpg, photo2.jpg, photo3.jpg, or yourphoto.jpg.
The app has no runtime console errors related to missing image assets.
Page layouts remain visually balanced after image removal (no broken spacing or empty placeholder blocks).

file_operations.description: Remove the RoundedImage import and remove all RoundedImage usage from Pages 2–5, ensuring the photo asset paths (photo1.jpg, photo2.jpg, photo3.jpg, yourphoto.jpg) are no longer referenced; adjust spacing/margins so each page remains visually balanced without an image block.
Delete the RoundedImage component so no image-rendering helper remains that could be referenced by Valentine pages.

requirements.summary: Update developer-facing asset documentation to reflect that photos and background music are no longer required.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/ASSETS.md no longer states that images/audio are required and does not instruct placing photo*.jpg or the mp3 under frontend/public/assets.
Documentation is consistent with the current UI behavior (no photos/music).

file_operations.description: Revise the asset guide to remove all instructions/requirements for photo*.jpg and the background music mp3 under frontend/public/assets, and document that the experience no longer uses photos or background music.
